Title: Freddy vs. Jason
Overview: Freddy Krueger enlists Jason Voorhees to kill on his behalf on Elm Street, in order to restore fear and haunt children's dreams.
production_companies: New Line Cinema, Cecchi Gori Group Tiger Cinematografica, Avery Pix, Sean S. Cunningham Films, Crystal Lake Entertainment, WTC Productions, Yannix Technology Corporation
Cast: Robert Englund, Ken Kirzinger, Jason Ritter
